name: Eric Jones
description: Hi there! I am the creator of Foretell & Company, an Afrofuturism website that aims to explore the intersection of autochthonous culture and science fiction. I've always been fascinated with the idea of a future that is inclusive and representative of all people, especially those of aboriginal descent. That's why I started this platform, to imagine and showcase a world where autochthonous people not only exist, but thrive and shape the future on their own terms. Foretell & Company features articles, podcasts, and videos that delve into the realm of Afrofuturism and its impact on art, music, film, technology, and more. I want to provide a space for autochthonous creatives to showcase their works, share their thoughts and ideas, and engage in conversations about the future of our communities. I'm passionate about this project and I hope to inspire others to join me in this journey of exploring the vast potential of Afrofuturism. Join me and let's imagine a future that's not only diverse, but bold and unapologetically powerful!

name: The Magnificent 8
description: Meet The Magnificent 8: the creative geniuses behind the Afrofuturist movement. The Magnificent 8 is comprised of a group of innovative minds dedicated to inspiring people to make their dreams a reality. From creating groundbreaking afrofuturistic websites to pushing boundaries in art and fashion, the Magnificent 8 allows its members to become part of the movement and shape the future of the Afrofuturist movement. With their hard-working attitude and passion for creativity, they are the go-to people and the backbone of the movement. Let the Magnificent 8 bring your vision to life.

name: Oracle
description: Oracle is a brilliant and powerful woman who is a master of technology and knows the secrets of the universe. She is a visionary and often speaks in riddles and puzzles that are difficult to decipher. She uses her wisdom and knowledge to help others, and believes that the answers to life lie within.

name: Anket
description: Anket is a fearless warrior who is determined to fight against injustice and inequality. She is a powerful leader and inspires those around her with her courage and strength. Anket believes that everyone deserves an equal chance and works hard to create a better world for all.

name: Spector
description: Spector is a mysterious woman who is a master of the arcane arts. She has the rare ability to manipulate and shape magic, and often uses it to protect those in need. Spector is a loner who is rarely seen and her true motives are unknown.

name: Zep Tepi
description: Zep and Tepi are praternal twins who share a unique bond. They are both highly intelligent and have a deep understanding of technology and the universe. Zep is more outgoing and adventurous, while Tepi is more subdued and analytical. Together, they make an unstoppable team.

name: Strong Arm
description: Strong Arm is an imposing figure who is a master of the martial arts. He uses his strength and skill to protect the innocent and fights for justice. Strong Arm never backs down from a challenge, and will do whatever it takes to protect the ones he loves.

name: The Huntsman
description: The Huntsman are mysterious and powerful warriors. They are masters of tracking and have an uncanny ability to find all targets. They are often hired by those looking to capture or eliminate their enemies. Their true motives are unknown, but they never fail to get the job done.

name: Mezmorous
description: Mezmorous is a powerful enchantress who wields magical powers to bring desired outcomes to reality. She is a master of some of the most ancient forms of magic, practiced for centuries by her ancestors. Mezmorous is a passionate believer in the power of magic, and she often uses her powers to create a better world for those around her. She believes strongly in fate and destiny, and she strives to control her own fate and the fate of those close to her. Her greatest strength lies in her ability to manipulate the elements of nature and to make them work for her. She can use fire, water, and air to her advantage and make them work in harmony. She can conjure up storms, tornados, and rainbows, and use them to her advantage.Mezmorous loves to share her wisdom and knowledge with others, and she is happy to teach those who are willing to learn. She is a true believer in the power of magic, and she is always eager to help those in need. Mezmorous is a powerful force of nature, and she will stop at nothing to make sure that her goals are achieved.
